content: In addition to using the Library of Congress Subject Headings (LCSH) system, please also specify the language in which "The Compassionate Mind" was originally written and provide the corresponding language code for the subject heading and subfield codes.

"The Compassionate Mind" by Paul Gilbert was originally written in English. In the Library of Congress Subject Headings (LCSH) system, English is represented by the language code "eng."

For subject headings in MARC (Machine-Readable Cataloging) records, the language code is often included in the 041 field, which indicates the language of the item. The subfield code for the language of text is ‡a. In this context, it would be:

- 041 ‡a eng

This code specifies that the text is in English. If you're cataloging or referencing this book in a library system, you would use this code to denote its original language.
